other_tests.findings: All four patients had positive patch test reactions to lichen acid mix and D-usnic acid.
other_tests.changes_over_time: During follow-up, one patient reported complete clearing of his dermatitis, another reported almost complete clearance of his hand and axillary dermatitis, and a third was free of dermatitis at follow-up.

other_tests.findings: Large aggregates of pigment granules distributed irregularly along the hair shaft.
Did not show giant granules in granulocytes.
Enlarged hyperpigmented basal melanocytes with sparsely pigmented adjacent keratinocytes.
